basics.name: John Hamson
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I a developer in the San Francisco bay area, driven by technical projects that offer meaningful solutions for complex world challenges. I currently work in the renewable energy industry, where I focus on customer facing web products. I enjoy working in teams that nourish curiosity and continuous learning. In my past life, before programming, I was a researcher, working on politics and anthropology in east Africa.

references.reference: John is one of the most creative, responsible and personable individuals that I worked with. He diligently completed all the tasks on time with great quality.
